introduction: The video provides an overview of containers and their benefits for application development and deployment. Containers are lightweight, isolated environments that enable developers to work on multiple projects simultaneously without conflicts. They are built on a base file system and can be customized with runtime changes. Containers also facilitate communication between different applications and can be deployed to various cloud platforms.
